metadata.synopsis: This AD is played when the player clicks on the circus advertising dummy, before noticing that there's something inside - so just reading the advertising written on it.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The Circus of the Last Days has RETURNED! See dryads, djinn, and Dribbles the Clown - back with a new act!*
0.context: NodeContext: note to narrator - feel free to go ham on this, if you think that works!
